Title: Ragunna Echoes Archive
Text:
Ragunna Echoes Archive

...The energy of the Common Echoes comes from the Sentinel and unknown realms deeper than the ocean. With the Sentinel's guidance, the Order of the Deep swiftly gained control of the Common Echoes and used them to guide Their people...

...The first serious shortage of Common Echoes emerged, accompanied by a rise in smuggling and private purchases of Echoes among the city's nobility. There is an immediate need to upgrade the frequency-cutting technology to reduce the time needed to cut and merge different TD frequencies, ultimately establishing a mass-production line for creating Echoes of diverse forms and abilities...

...The Order of the Deep has obtained direct control of long-range aggregation technology. The Common Echoes they created would remain in a perpetual frequency-aggregate state within the boundaries of Rinascita, only to be disassembled under rare circumstances. This marks a breakthrough in the spatial and temporal limitations of Common Echoes, as well as a significant improvement in their stability...

...As opposition grew, the Order developed a new kind of Echo: La Guardia. They served as the watchful eyes and forceful hands of the Order, and their creation helped restore public trust in the ordinary Common Echoes...

...The experiments on implanting and shaping the consciousness of the Echoes in the Fabricatorium have shown progress. However, the data from the first samples couldn't be applied to any Common Echo, and the stability of their consciousness requires further refinement...
